name: Minimalist Blazer
longDescription: A timeless blazer crafted from premium linen. The clean lines and minimal detailing allow the fabric to speak. Perfect for layering or wearing alone, this piece moves with intention and purpose.
careInstructions: Hand wash or gentle machine wash
Iron on low heat if needed

name: Essential Trench
longDescription: A wardrobe essential. This trench is designed for layering and movement, crafted from sturdy cotton twill. The neutral tone works with everything.

name: Silk Evening Gown
description: Luxurious silk gown for special occasions
longDescription: Crafted from premium silk charmeuse, this gown drapes with intention. The understated elegance speaks volumes. Perfect for evenings that demand presence and grace.

name: Contemporary Shirt
description: Modern cut shirt in premium cotton
longDescription: A contemporary take on the classic shirt. Designed with clean lines and precise tailoring. Works for work or weekend.

name: Future Piece One
longDescription: A vision of tomorrow. This piece explores new silhouettes and proportions while maintaining our core philosophy of intentional design.

name: Minimal Knit
longDescription: A wardrobe fundamental. Fine gauge knit that works alone or layered. Timeless in every sense.

name: Elegant Saree
longDescription: Handwoven with intricate detailing, this saree celebrates traditional craftsmanship while maintaining contemporary appeal. Perfect for celebrations and special moments.

name: Crisp Cotton Pants
description: Tailored cotton pants for everyday wear
longDescription: Perfectly proportioned cotton pants that work with everything. Clean tailoring and premium fabric ensure comfort and longevity.

name: Embroidered Kurta
longDescription: A beautiful fusion of tradition and modernity. Each piece features hand-embroidery that tells a story. Perfect for gatherings and celebrations.
